Literature.Title: Cell specificity, anti-inflammatory activity, and plausible bactericidal mechanism of designed Trp-rich model antimicrobial peptides
Literature.Author: Shin SY, Hahm KS, Park IS, Kim JI, Park Y, Nan YH, Park KH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=4µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=2µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3001(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus CCARM 3543(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CCARM 2095(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CCARM 2109(MIC=16µM)
